page.title: 04THE JONES FAMILY
page.content:
To-day is Thursday. David, who is a bus driver gets up around 5.15am. We are up for 8am breakfast and go to the school for 8.55am. I catch the bus to Hillsborough Shopping Centre where I buy all the groceries we need for the week at the supermarket.
David usually comes home for lunch. This is our main meal of the day which we share together. After lunch the children go back to school and David to work. Ben, Laura and I are the only ones for tea as David does not arrive home until 7pm. We normally settle down in the evenings to do our own hobbies. Ben has his train layout, David his railway books, Laura reads, plays with her toys or watches TV. I knit, sew, read or watch TV.
